title: Signed up for PBE before they closed sign up
body: I signed up for PBE a couple months ago and I still have not gotten any email. Is it possible that even after the sign ups are closed I may be able to get the email saying I got in?

replies.body: Now that the [**signups have been closed for maintenance**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe), I'm not too sure of your chances of getting accepted into PBE. Be sure to keep checking your email just in case though!
But you are telling me that there is a little chance?
will we ever be able to sign up again? I really wanna join pbe
